section.section: The Administration shall adopt regulations that establish mandatory training and testing requirements that a political subdivision that operates a fire department, rescue squad, emergency medical services unit, or volunteer fire department must implement before the political subdivision may authorize an individual to operate an emergency vehicle in accordance with subsection (a)(12) of this section.

text.section: An individual who is subject to the provisions of this section and who fails to comply with the provisions of this section is guilty of a misdemeanor.
